column7: Preparation of articles and notes for publication in the University of Illinois Law Review, Elder Law Journal, Journal of Law Technology and Policy, Illinois Law Update section of the Illinois Bar Journal. Teaching practicums and clinical assistantships for Law courses and clinics. No graduate credit. 1 to 2 professional hours. Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours in the same term and to a maximum of 22 hours in separate terms.
